alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 12 at 9:33AM CST until March 15 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Above Philadelphia. * WHEN...Until late Monday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Saturday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon and continue falling to 12.1 feet by Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 13 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Pearl River Philadelphi 13.0 13.7 Sat 8 am CST 13.2 12.9 12.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1230 AM CST.
